product_name: GoLite TraveLite Carry-on Wheeled Luggage - 14" - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Got an overnight jaunt or quick business trip? The GoLite TraveLite 14" Carry-on Wheeled Luggage is small enough to fit under your seat, yet large enough to carry a laptop and clothes.
short_description: Got an overnight jaunt or quick business trip? The GoLite TraveLite 14" Carry-on Wheeled Luggage is small enough to fit under your seat, yet large enough to carry a laptop and clothes.
